columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: The file representing the software id tag.

columnDefinition.name: Regid
columnDefinition.description: The regid for the software id tag.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The name for the software id tag.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies bits of software id tag.
